definition: an overall plan/to plan an entire project as a whole
to gather/to unite/to unify/whole
chip (in gambling)/token (for counting)/ticket/to prepare/to plan/to raise (funds)/resource/means
an overall plan taking into account all factors

sentences.english: If well-planned, life will be one with fewer regrets.
sentences.chinese: 統籌好了，人生便少了許多遺憾。

sentences.english: Compared with other methods, this approach has better overall consideration.
sentences.chinese: 與有關方法比較，該方法具有很好的統籌兼顧性。

sentences.english: We will balance promoting urbanization and building a new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 統籌推進城鎮化和新農村建設。

sentences.english: Third, coordination to eradicate the source of conflicts and disputes should be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 加強統籌協調，消除爭端衝突產生的根源。

sentences.english: Description: Organises services and activities related to leisure, sports, culture and the arts.
sentences.chinese: 統籌與康樂體育及文化藝術有關的活動和服務。

sentences.english: You talk about, you know, being able to prioritize and manage.
sentences.chinese: 你要談到的是，你知道，你能夠合理統籌，顧全大局。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the paper probed into the development pattern of Unitary Development of Urban and Rural in Gaocheng.
sentences.chinese: 再次，對藁城市城鄉統籌發展模式進行了深入研究。

sentences.english: China's basic pension system consists of social pooling and each citizen's individual account.
sentences.chinese: 中國基本養老保險制度由社會統籌和個人帳戶組成。

sentences.english: In case of a shortage of reserves, the people's government of the pooling region shall advance the payment.
sentences.chinese: 儲備金不足支付的，由統籌地區的人民政府墊付。

sentences.english: Attention to the layout of urban and rural settlements in the co-ordination and rationalisation .
sentences.chinese: 注意城鄉統籌和合理調整居民點佈局。

sentences.english: Fifthly it is proposed to set up a multi-tiered high rank leading team to carry out unified coordination.
sentences.chinese: 第五，建議成立高層次領導小組，進行統籌協調工作。

sentences.english: Who should lead change and gather support for it?
sentences.chinese: 誰應當領導這場改革及統籌支援？

sentences.english: Integrating rural and urban development is the core mission of establishment of "New Special Zone" in Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 統籌城鄉發展是重慶“新特區”建設的核心任務。

sentences.english: The specific approaches to urban-rural coordinated planning are closely related to the three issues.
sentences.chinese: 城鄉統籌規劃的具體方法與這三件事密切相關。

sentences.english: Fourth, adopt a holistic approach for comprehensive and balanced growth.
sentences.chinese: 第四，統籌兼顧，實現全面均衡發展。

sentences.english: But spending cuts must be balanced with more reforms to our tax code.
sentences.chinese: 但是削減開支必須統籌兼顧，競選更多的稅法改革。

definition: to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
optimization/to optimize/to make superior
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to provide assistance/to aid
to plan (how to do sth)/planning/plan/program
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
cooperation/coordination
practical/workable/to implement/to carry out/to decide
to combine/to join/unite/alliance
mechanism
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
team
project
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
